        public ChronicleQueueBuilder.VanillaChronicleQueueBuilder synchronous(boolean synchronous)
        Sets the synchronous mode to be used. Enabling synchronous mode means that ExcerptCommon.finish() will force a persistence every time.
        Parameters:
        synchronous - If synchronous mode should be used or not.
        Returns:
        this builder object back
